EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Greenplum Summit_New Jersey_Q118.GP Summit - Four - 4/10
EmailTemplate.subject: 5 Sessions You Won’t Want to Miss at Greenplum Summit at PostgresConf
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://greenplumsummit.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=gp-summit-april-q118]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, I firmly believe that you do not want to miss the best minds in massively parallel processing (MPP), open source, Postgres, and advanced analytics all coming together for Greenplum Summit <[[http://greenplumsummit.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=gp-summit-april-q118]]> at PostgresConf <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018]]>, beginning April 16 in Jersey City. Which is why I’m writing to tell you there’s still time to sign up! A single pass gives you full access to both PostgresConf and Greenplum Summit. Use code 2018_GPDB to get a 25% discount when you register <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018/buytickets]]>. 5 Sessions You Won’t Want to Miss <[[http://greenplumsummit.io/schedule?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=gp-summit-april-q118]]>:
- Keynote: Data Tells the Story <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018/program/proposals/pivotal-diamond-sponsor-keynote]]> - Scott Yara, Senior VP Product and Greenplum Co-Founder, Pivotal
- Greenplum Overview for Postgres Hackers <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018/program/proposals/greenplum-overview-for-postgresql-hackers]]> - Heikki Linnakangas, Senior Principal Software Engineer, Pivotal
- Greenplum: Building a Postgres Fabric for Large-Scale Analytical Computation <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018/program/proposals/greenplum-summit-am-session-1]]>- Elisabeth Hendrickson, VP Data R&D, Pivotal and Jacque Istok, Head of Data, Pivotal
- Pivotal Greenplum in Action on AWS, Azure, and GCP <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018/program/proposals/pivotal-greenplum-in-action-on-aws-azure-and-gcp]]> - Jon Roberts, Principal Engineer, Data Innovation Lab, Pivotal
- Beyond Business Intelligence (BI): Data Science with Postgres Compatible Databases <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018/program/proposals/beyond-business-intelligence-bi-data-science-in-the-open-source-greenplum-database]]> - Woo Jung, Principal Data Scientist, Pivotal
Stay Connected! Join the conversation on Twitter #DataTellsTheStory <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/DataTellsTheStory?src=hash]]>, and follow @PivotalData <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalData]]> and @Greenplum <[[https://twitter.com/Greenplum]]> for news and updates. I look forward to seeing you there, Jacque
